hint: Focus on filter pushdown and converting comma joins to explicit JOINs for better predicate control, while keeping structure simple.
Isolate date and dimension filters into CTEs, then join with main fact table and attempt to decorrelate the subquery via CTE materialization.
Materialize all pre-filtered dimension and fact tables in separate CTEs, then restructure the self-join subquery to compute aggregates once.
Transform the OR condition on item into UNION branches, flatten the correlated subquery via lateral join, and decompose the self-join pattern.
